summary: Test suite that validates the ContainsSolver component, confirming it accurately detects specified items within various Terraform infrastructure attributes such as dictionaries, lists, CIDR block collections, network ACL configurations, and virtual machine exposure, while also handling JSONPath queries and variableâ€‘based policies.
